arts.ttl: Where IS Cole Palmer going? Fans mock Chelsea star's BIZARRE sprint away from Stamford Bridge after beating Everton
arts.sum: The bizarre video, taken after he featured in Chelsea 's 1-0 win over Everton, prompted a wave of speculation from fans: where on earth was Palmer going, and why was he in such a rush?

arts.ttl: The lowdown on Chelsea 1 Everton 0 - Blues do what they need to, to stay on Champions League trail
arts.sum: Chelsea: Sanchez, Caicedo, Chalobah, Colwill, Cucurella, Lavia (James 66), Fernandez, Madueke (Sancho 78), Palmer (Dewsbury-Hall 90), Pedro Neto, Jackson (George 90) Subs not used: Acheampong, Badiashile, Jorgensen, Nkunku, Tosin It’s now 31 years and 30 league games since the Toffees won at Stamford Bridge and once again, the Merseysiders were perfect opposition for a Chelsea side in need of points to keep up their bid for a top five finish.

arts.ttl: Jackson strike helps Chelsea see off Everton to move back into CL places
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League match between Chelsea and Everton.

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans urge club to ‘break the bank’ to sign Everton player who was ‘top-notch’ in Saturday’s Stamford Bridge clash
arts.sum: One fan said he's 'in the JT mould'.

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans have theory on why Cole Palmer is struggling after once again failing to score in win over Everton
arts.sum: He struggled once again in the 1-0 win over the Toffees...

arts.ttl: Nicolas Jackson rediscovers scoring touch at the right time for Chelsea
arts.sum: The Blues are pushing for the Champions League and saw off Everton.
